description: Track and trap a variety of creatures across Gielinor for their pelts, meat, or other valuable resources.

trainingMethods.name: Grey Chinchompas (Box Trapping)
trainingMethods.location: Piscatoris Hunter area (West of Eagles' Peak)
trainingMethods.notes: Decent XP, chinchompas are stackable and used for Ranged training.

trainingMethods.name: Red Chinchompas (Box Trapping)
trainingMethods.location: Feldip Hunter area (private area is best)
questsRequired: Big Chompy Bird Hunting (for ogre access to some areas)
trainingMethods.notes: Fastest Hunter XP for a long time. Very profitable.

trainingMethods.name: Black Salamanders (Net Trapping)
trainingMethods.notes: Good XP, but located in the Wilderness (PvP risk).

trainingMethods.name: Herbiboar
trainingMethods.notes: Unique tracking method. Gives herbs, fossils, and a chance at the Herbi pet.

trainingMethods.name: Maniacal Monkeys (Kruk's Dungeon)
trainingMethods.notes: Very fast Hunter XP using chinchompas to hit multiple monkeys. Click intensive.
